note:
An old timer watching an egg timer.

I've been many things - Firefighter, HazMat Tech, IT Support, DNS Admin/Engineer, Vice President (I still can't get over that one), Deck Hand, Sailor, Soldier, Tinker, Spy... Well, maybe not all of those, but most.

I live in Kharkiv, Ukraine. I do not plan to return, long-term, to the United States.

Follow me if you want to be amazed at what a human may (or may not) be able to accomplish.
